short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Posts, Accounts, Followers, and more from BlueSky, then export to CSV, Excel, JSON, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlueSky Data Extractor & Downloader - Export Posts, Profiles & Social Data to CSV/Excel/JSON

Overview:
This powerful BlueSky (bsky.app) data extraction tool enables you to automatically download and convert posts, profiles, and social interactions into multiple formats including CSV, Excel, and JSON. Our scraper extracts detailed information from user profiles, posts, and social connections, making it the perfect tool for marketers, researchers, analysts, journalists, and social media managers.

Key Features:
✓ Extract data from user profiles, posts, and social connections
✓ Export to multiple formats: CSV, Excel (XLSX), JSON, XML, TXT
✓ Automatic pagination and data collection
✓ User authentication support
✓ Unlimited data extraction for premium users

What Data You Can Extract:
• Posts & Interactions
- Post content and metadata
- Comments and replies
- Likes and engagement metrics
- Repost information

• Profile Data
- User profile details
- Follower lists
- Following lists
- Social connections

Perfect For:
Market Research: Analyze trends and user behavior on BlueSky
Social Analysis: Track engagement and interaction patterns
Content Marketing: Monitor and analyze successful content strategies
Academic Research: Gather social media data for studies

Export Format Support:
• CSV - Perfect for spreadsheet analysis
• Excel (XLSX) - Formatted with proper data types
• JSON - Ideal for developers
• HTML Table - Easy to read and analyze
• XML - Structured data export
• TXT - Plain text format
• Raw JSON - Complete data access

Known Limitations:
• Rate limits apply for non-Premium users
• Requires user authentication

Technical Support:
Need assistance? Contact us: hello@nifty.codes
Feature requests & bug reports available through support channels

Privacy & Security:
Your login credentials are required to use this extension but are kept strictly confidential and never disclosed to third parties.
Exported data is formatted on our servers and never stored.
